interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " The Depressing Implication of Goosebumps " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Value of Sharing " .

progression.synopsis: With Makoto absent , Miku isn't doing well with the loud noises at the party â€” Ayane and Sana immediately agree to turn the music down. Ayane invites Miku to talk about her issues if she wants, but Miku would rather not. Miku accidentally lets Ayane and Sana know what happened with Sensei that morning.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p1.
